colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B ('JIGS BYED KYI CHOS SKOR RVA SKYING ZHANG @004A *, ,GSUM GYIS LUNG YOD PA LAS, GAN LUGS KYIS SROL 'DZIN CHEN PO DPAL 'DZIN GYIS DPAL PO LAS JI LTAR 'BYUNG BA LTAR `MI DBANG NAM MKHA' DBANG PHYUGS GI TSE SGRUBS KYIS PHYIR DU, GSHIN RJE GSHED KYI RNAL 'BYOR PA BSKAL BZANG 'PHRIN LAS LHUN GRUB KYIS BRIS PA'O,, ,,)
